description: A workflow that conducts thorough research on a topic combining multiple data sources

params.explanation: Initial web search to gather general information on the topic
Searching for technical details and implementations related to the topic
Searching for the most recent developments and news about the topic

params.thought: Analyzing general information about ${context.topic} from web search results: ${steps.initial-web-search.snippets}
Analyzing technical details and implementations of ${context.topic}: ${steps.technical-web-search.snippets}
Analyzing recent developments and news about ${context.topic}: ${steps.recent-developments-search.snippets}

Analyzing the top GitHub repositories for ${context.topic}. Found ${steps.github-repository-search.items.length} relevant repositories with the most popular being ${steps.github-repository-search.items[0].full_name} with ${steps.github-repository-search.items[0].stargazers_count} stars.
Analyzing code examples for ${context.topic} from GitHub code search. Found ${steps.github-code-search.total_count} code matches. Common patterns include...
Analyzing challenges and issues related to ${context.topic} based on GitHub issues and open problems. Found ${steps.github-issues-search.total_count} issues. Common challenges include...
Synthesizing a conceptual overview of ${context.topic} based on all gathered information. Key concepts include: ${steps.analyze-general-info.thought} ${steps.analyze-technical-details.thought}
Synthesizing technical aspects of ${context.topic} based on code examples and implementation details. ${steps.analyze-technical-details.thought} ${steps.analyze-code-examples.thought}
Analyzing the current state-of-the-art for ${context.topic} based on recent developments and active projects. ${steps.analyze-recent-developments.thought} ${steps.analyze-github-repos.thought}
Identifying emerging trends and future directions for ${context.topic} based on recent developments, ongoing work, and community interests.
Compiling a list of the most valuable resources for learning about and working with ${context.topic}, including documentation, tutorials, libraries, and tools.
